name: Save The Last Dance
description:
Your name is Lady Siofra Aine Whelan, the nightmare of every farmer's daughter's father, knight in shining armor, and holy ward to the goddess of flames, Fyrshala. You and your pirate friend Susan find yourself in a pinch.

It's the last boss fight of Disc 1. The enemy, an elven warrior named Braveleaf, is on the ropes. However, this next action could determine everything. And Siofra's turn has just come up again.

How will you react, hero?

Requires Gluxle to run. It can be downloaded here

An online version of the game can be played here. You can download the cheat guide on how to get all the endings separately below if you play this version.
